## Definition of Done (module)

- Code merged with review
- Tests pass (unit + integration + E2E/regression as applicable)
- README + AGENTS.md updated if behavior/contract changed
- `docs/03_MODULES.md` updated if capabilities/contracts changed
- Python interpreter verified: `python --version` matches project requirement
- No invented code in extraction tasks (source inventory verified)
